pkgmetadata.longdescription: Edit ForeignKey, ManyToManyField and CharField in Django Admin using jQuery UI AutoComplete.- Customize search query- Query other resources besides Django ORM- Format results with HTML- Customize styling- Customize security policy- Add additional custom UI alongside widget- Integrate with other UI elements elsewhere on the page using the javascript API- Works in Admin as well as in normal views- Django >=3, <=4- Python >=3.6
